Just for fun

If you have a gun you can rob a bank, but if you have a bank you can rob anyone.

October 1st, 2017

10:05pm-10:15pm

422 individual people were shot.

58 killed.

Tens of thousands ran in a panic.

The Vegas shooting should’ve been the last straw for American gun violence.

The exact same thing could happen today.

We’ve done nothing to prevent another Vegas.

Since then thousands more lives have been lost to gun violence.
